attributes.action: Fair bus fares for under 16s in Reading
attributes.additional_details:
Bus fares for under 16s in Reading are far to expensive. £2.20 for a day/return and £1.30 for a single bus journey. Our organisation is here to promote and make a change to the prices in Reading for under 16s. Sighn our petition and make a change!

http://fairbusfares.webs.com/

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
